Legal_Issue: Can the plaintiffs amend their Statement of Claim to include new particulars or causes of action without being barred by limitation periods?
Application_Facts: The plaintiffs seek amendments to their claim regarding breaches of trust by the Crown. The amendments detail failures in managing mineral rights.
Decision_Outcome: Amendments allowed under Rule 201 as they arise from substantially the same facts as the original claim, serving justice despite potential limitations.
Remedy_Requested: Leave to amend the Statement of Claim
Court_Ruling: Amendments allowed; no prejudice to defendant, costs awarded appropriately.
